languages.text: Стоит упомянуть, что тогда не только я, но и остальные присутствующие обратили внимание — теперь не только глаза, но и руки и головы некоторых из сервиторов дрожали. Как будто каждый из них, стоя перед нами, ощущал первобытный ужас.

traits.locale_text: Стоит упомянуть, что тогда не только я, но и остальные присутствующие обратили внимание — теперь не только глаза, но и руки и головы некоторых из сервиторов дрожали. Как будто каждый из них, стоя перед нами, ощущал первобытный ужас.

languages.text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.
languages.original_text: Стоит упомянуть, что тогда не только я, но и остальные присутствующие обратили внимание — теперь не только глаза, но и руки и головы некоторых из сервиторов дрожали. Как будто каждый из них, стоя перед нами, ощущал первобытный ужас.

traits.locale_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us there discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if those mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us there discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if those mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

languages.text: その瞬間、私たち全員が気付いたもう一つのことを記述しておこう。目だけでなく、一部のサーヴィターの手や頭も震えていることがわかった。まるで機械仕掛けの召使たちが原始的な恐怖に襲われているかのようだった。
languages.original_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

traits.locale_text: その瞬間、私たち全員が気付いたもう一つのことを記述しておこう。目だけでなく、一部のサーヴィターの手や頭も震えていることがわかった。まるで機械仕掛けの召使たちが原始的な恐怖に襲われているかのようだった。

languages.text: J'ajouterai une chose : à cet instant, toutes les personnes présentes virent qu'en plus de leurs yeux, la tête et les mains de certains servitors tremblaient elles aussi. On aurait dit que ces serviteurs mécaniques étaient submergés par une terreur primordiale.
languages.original_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

traits.locale_text: J'ajouterai une chose : à cet instant, toutes les personnes présentes virent qu'en plus de leurs yeux, la tête et les mains de certains servitors tremblaient elles aussi. On aurait dit que ces serviteurs mécaniques étaient submergés par une terreur primordiale.

languages.text: 我还应该指出另外一件事情：当时，我们在场的所有人都发现，那些机仆不仅仅只有眼睛颤抖，他们的头部与手部也在颤抖。那些机械化的仆人似乎处于某种原始的恐惧之中。
languages.original_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

traits.locale_text: 我还应该指出另外一件事情：当时，我们在场的所有人都发现，那些奴工不仅仅只有眼睛颤抖，他们的头部与手部也在颤抖。那些机械化的仆人似乎处于某种原始的恐惧之中。

languages.text: Debería señalar una cosa más: en ese momento, todos los presentes descubrimos que no eran solo los ojos: también las manos y las cabezas de algunos de los servidores habían empezado a temblar. Era como si un terror primordial se hubiera apoderado de nuestros siervos mecanizados.
languages.original_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

traits.locale_text: Debería señalar una cosa más: en ese momento, todos los presentes descubrimos que no eran solo los ojos: también las manos y las cabezas de algunos de los servidores habían empezado a temblar. Era como si un terror primordial se hubiera apoderado de nuestros siervos mecanizados.

languages.text: Eines sollte ich noch anmerken: In diesem Augenblick stellten wir Anwesenden fest, dass nun nicht mehr nur die Augen einiger Servitoren zitterten, sondern auch ihre Hände und Köpfe. Es war, als seien die mechanisierten Diener von einer schrecklichen Urangst ergriffen worden.
languages.original_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

traits.locale_text: Eines sollte ich noch anmerken: In diesem Augenblick stellten wir Anwesenden fest, dass nun nicht mehr nur die Augen einiger Servitoren zitterten, sondern auch ihre Hände und Köpfe. Es war, als seien die mechanisierten Diener von einer schrecklichen Urangst ergriffen worden.

languages.text: Bir ekleme daha yapmam icap ediyor: O ana şahit olan bizler, bazı hizmetörlerin gözlerine ek olarak ellerinin ve başlarının da hareket ettiğini gördük. Mekanik hizmetkârlar, âdeta ezelî bir dehşetin pençesine düşmüştü.
languages.original_text: I should make note of one more thing: at that moment, all of us present discovered that not just the eyes, but the hands and heads of some of the servitors were now shaking too. It was as if the mechanised servants were overcome with some primordial terror.

traits.locale_text: Bir ekleme daha yapmam icap ediyor: O ana şahit olan bizler, bazı hizmetörlerin gözlerine ek olarak ellerinin ve başlarının da hareket ettiğini gördük. Mekanik hizmetkârlar âdeta ezelî bir dehşetin pençesine düşmüştü.
